member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.GetWallSolid(Revit.Elements.Wall)
member.summary: Get the Autodesk.DB.Solid for the specified wall
member.returns: Autodesk.DB.Solid || The solid, representing the wall Geometry in the API

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.GetWallSolidTransformed(Revit.Elements.Wall,Autodesk.Revit.DB.RevitLinkInstance)
member.summary: Get the Autodesk.DB.Solid for the specified wall from linked model
member.param: Wall || A wall instance from linked model
member.returns: Autodesk.DB.Solid || The solid, representing the wall Geometry in the API

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.GetAndUniteElementSolids(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: Get all the solids of an Element, unite them and return the united solid with transformed coordinate system, based on the link instance. Works for all objects, classified as Dynamo Elements, such as Windows, Doors, etc.
member.returns: Autodesk.DB.Solid || A single solid, representing all element solids in the API

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.GetAndUniteElementSolidsTransformed(Revit.Elements.Element,Autodesk.Revit.DB.RevitLinkInstance)
member.summary: Get all the solids of an Element, unite them and return the united solid with transformed coordinate system, based on the link instance. Works for all objects, classified as Dynamo Elements, such as Windows, Doors, etc.
member.returns: Autodesk.DB.Solid || A single solid, representing all element solids in the API

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.ReturnDynamoSolid(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Solid)
member.summary: Wrap Revit Autodesk.Revit.DB.Solid to get Dynamo solid

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.RevitAPIExtrusionFromCurve(Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Curve,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create Autodesk.Revit.DB.Solid from a single curve, by offseting the curve in both direction, creating closed curveloop and extruding it
member.param: height || A specified width for the offset

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.RevitAPIExtrusionFromCurveTransformed(Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Curve,System.Double,System.Double,Autodesk.Revit.DB.RevitLinkInstance)
member.summary: Create Autodesk.Revit.DB.Solid from a single curve, by offseting the curve in both direction, creating closed curveloop, extruding and transforming its coordinate system
member.param: Double || A specified width for the offset

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.TranslateSolidVertically(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Solid,System.Double)
member.summary: Translate Autodesk.revit.DB.Solid along the Z axis at the specified distance
member.param: Number || A specified distance for vertical translation

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.ElementOrientedBboxSolid(Revit.Elements.Element,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns element oriented bounding box for the specified element, represented as Revit API solid
member.param: Revit Family Instance || Tested with Windows and Doors

member.name: M:GeometryAPI.SolidsAPI.ElementOrientedBboxSolidTransformed(Revit.Elements.Element,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point,System.Double,Autodesk.Revit.DB.RevitLinkInstance)
member.summary: Returns element oriented bounding box for the specified element, represented as Revit API solid, transformed, based on the link instance coordinate system
member.param: Revit Family Instance || Tested with Windows and Doors
